summary: Steve Jobs' excellent marketing helped make Apple one of the world's most valuable brands. Marketing is all about keeping customers happy and coming back for more. It's done by businesses, sometimes with help from special marketing firms. Marketers consider many things when planning, like who the product is for and how to best advertise it. They might use coupons or other deals to encourage people to buy. This careful planning helps ensure the product's success.
title: Marketing
